doc.field: Series D.III. New York City Buildings, Parks and Other Cityscapes (2002 and later)
Series D.III. New York City Buildings, Parks and Other Cityscapes (2002 and later)

1-3) 7th Avenue between 22nd and 23rd streets; 4) 7th Avenue between 20th and 21st streets; 5-8) 5th Avenue between 23rd and 24th streets; 9-13) food cart on 5th Avenue between 23rd and 24th streets; 14) detail of the facade of the Flatiron Building; 15) Bellevue Hospital at East 29th Street; 16) pedestrian mall/plaza in front of the Flatiron Building, looking north with Empire State Building in background; 17) west side of 5th Avenue between 23rd and 22nd Street with glimpse of the Flatiron Building and pedestrian mall/plaza.
